thread.section_title: Compare Broadband Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Compare Broadband | comparebroadband.com.au
thread.title: Pam

author: Pam
title: Pam
text: I was surprised at the amount of response to my initial searches. I was just browsing and got emails with a list of options suiting my search and follow up calls. I came back a few weeks later and made more searches. the best idea was taliking to customer services. We had a good chat about a broader view of internet and mobile phone services which is not covered by them but was included as general information. So i was very happy.
